name: VW-MACD SAR Trend FX
description: Hourly trend-following strategy for the four most-liquid Forex majors. Entries use simultaneous Volume-Weighted MACD histogram zero-cross and Parabolic SAR flip, filtered by above-average daily volume. Risk is controlled with fixed-fractional sizing at 2 % equity, ATR-based initial and trailing stops, and a 2×ATR reward cap or indicator reversal exit. Designed for 24-hour FX trading with moderate risk profile.
